full_summary:
# Power Level Monitoring System

## Tender Title and Reference
**Title:** Power Level Monitoring System
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006763

## Tender Information
* **Publication Date:** September 9, 2022
* **Closing Date:** September 27, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** September 13, 2022
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Contract Information
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

## Goods and Services Information
* **P Quincy Miscellaneous Hardware and Supplies (GSIN):** N5975
* **Description (English):** Electrical Hardware and Supplies
* **Description (French):** Quincaillerie et fournitures électriques
* **Expected Start Date:** None
* **Expected End Date:** None

## Contact Information
* **Contact Name (English):** Marius Lacasse
* **Contact Name (French):** Marius Lacasse
* **Contact Email:** marius.lacasse@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** None
* **Contact Fax:** None
* **Contact Address (English):** 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E6
* **Contact Address (French):** 200, rue Kent, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E6

## Tender Description
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires a Power Level Monitoring System. The required goods and services are as follows:

* Power Level Monitoring System
* Delivery Location: Dartmouth, NS
* Requested delivery date for all items: March 31, 2023

Pre-qualified Suppliers have been invited to bid. Suppliers that do not already hold a Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with PSPC cannot submit a bid. For more information on becoming a qualified SA Holder, please contact PSPC at steve.dumaresq@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.
